amendment.description: To prohibit the use of funds for a nuclear earth penetrator weapon.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 750 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 56 - 41. Record Vote Number: 189.
Amendment SA 750 proposed by Senator Dorgan. (consideration: CR S6797-6804; text: CR S6797; text as modified: CR S6802) To prohibit the use of funds for a nuclear earth penetrator weapon.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 750 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 56 - 41. Record Vote Number: 189.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 750 proposed by Senator Dorgan.
